text: Sure, I can definitely help you understand your pain.

According to a survey conducted on the patients at Deuk Spine, the following is the distribution of pain:

20% - Cervical Vertebrae
5% - Thoracic Vertebrae
75% - Lumbar Vertebrae
1% - Sacrum.

transitionRoutes.name: 18134085-bf19-4953-8507-4f47be16b8ca
transitionRoutes.description:
Entered the Spinal Conditions Page. This is a Start page and hence used for redirection.

--> Firstly, give a short explanation of the major areas of pain along the 
     spine. 
--> Redirect it to next page to check if they have the MRI report.
